00036 #ifndef PACC_Threading_Exception_hpp_
00037 #define PACC_Threading_Exception_hpp_
00038 
00039 #include <stdexcept>
00040 #include <string>
00041 
00042 namespace PACC { 
00043     
00044     using namespace std;
00045     
00046     namespace Threading {
00047         
00049         enum Error {
00050             eMutexNotOwned, 
00051             eWouldDeadLock, 
00052             eRunning, 
00053             eOtherError 
00054         };
00055         
00063         class Exception : public runtime_error {
00064             public:
00066             explicit Exception(int inNativeCode, const string& inMessage)
00067             : runtime_error(inMessage), mCode(convertNativeError(inNativeCode)), mNativeCode(inNativeCode) {}
00069             explicit Exception(Error inCode, const string& inMessage) : runtime_error(inMessage), mCode(inCode), mNativeCode(0) {}
00070             
00071             static Error convertNativeError(int inError);
00072             
00074             int getErrorCode() {return mCode;}
00075             
00076             string getMessage() const throw();
00077             
00078             protected:
00079             Error mCode; 
00080             int mNativeCode; 
00081             
00082         };
00083         
00084     } // end of Threading namespace
00085     
00086 } // end of PACC namespace
00087 
00088 #endif  // PACC_Threading_Exception_hpp_
